title: Whoever designed Kalista needs to resign.
body:
They need to take a long, hard look at themselves then quit game design forever and never look back.  This is possibly THE most toxic champ ever introduced to the game: her kit is unfathomably overpowered.

I have never seen a company create something so totally opposite to previous design goals 'we're aware of mobility creep' then they go and design something like Kalista.  Actually I have seen a company do that before, and their name is Blizzard.  Whoever made this champ should go work for them; they'd fit right in.

If you're losing to her, figure out how to counter her and take responsibility. Rather than coming here and whining like a lil %%%%%. She's strong right now, but is out-traded by Graves, Jinx, Cait and post 6 Corki... So...
